text:
Sir Peregrine Gerard Worsthorne (22 December 1923 – 3 October 2020) was a British journalist, writer and broadcaster. Worsthorne spent the largest part of his career at the "Telegraph" newspaper titles, eventually becoming editor of "The Sunday Telegraph" for several years. He left the newspaper in 1997.
Worsthorne died on 3 October 2020 at his home in Buckinghamshire, aged 96.
